name: Glam Metal
description: Very catchy hooks and guitar riffs, sing-along choruses, and lyrics often glamorizing the "sex, drugs and rock & roll" lifestyle.

children.name: Sleaze Rock
children.description: Raw and lurid form of Glam Metal with influences from Glam Punk and Blues Rock and back-to-basics songwriting; emerged to counter Pop influences in Hard Rock in the mid-to-late 1980s.
